titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Emergency Medical Staffing Recruitment and Retention Act

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to modify the hours of employment of physicians and physician assistants employed on a full-time basis by the Department of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
5/21/2015--Introduced. Department of Veterans Affairs Emergency Medical Staffing Recruitment and Retention Act
Authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to modify the hours of employment for a physician or physician assistant appointed in the VA on a full-time basis to more or less than 80 hours in a biweekly pay period provided the employee's total hours of employment in a calendar year do not exceed 2,080.
